issue.title: Walking controller stability decreases as real time factor decreases

content.raw: Seeing some of these instability problems with full simulation. Walking that works with a single task fails in full simulation. But some full simulations are okay. It's hard to tell but it looks like the footsteps are not being handled properly, i.e. the resulting position is not the targeted position.
content.html: Seeing some of these instability problems with full simulation. Walking that works with a single task fails in full simulation. But some full simulations are okay. It's hard to tell but it looks like the footsteps are not being handled properly, i.e. the resulting position is not the targeted position.
